title: Mobil movielogue. No. 10
brief_description: Documentary film about the various uses of petroleum. Features the Fisherman’s Bend Commonwealth Aircraft factory; shows the manufacturing and testing of Rolls Royce jet engines as used in RAAF Vampire aircraft; the Rover gas turbine car on test tracks; launch of petrol tanker; Altona Refinery opening; Army petrol driven vehicles; speed boats on Sydney Harbour; Bathurst - Mount Panorama circuit in action.
